verses.name: Nehemiah 7:3
verses.text: And I said unto them, Let not the gates of Jerusalem be opened until the sun be hot; and while they stand by, let them shut the doors, and bar them: and appoint watches of the inhabitants of Jerusalem, every one in his watch, and every one to be over against his house.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:4
verses.text: Now the city was large and great: but the people were few therein, and the houses were not builded.
